task.title: Removing the Differential Gear
task.shortdesc: Remove the differential gear from the rear axle shaft by manipulating the retaining ring and splines.

taskbody.context: The differential gear connects to the rear axle shaft via splines and is secured by a two-piece retaining ring in the shaft groove.

step.cmd: Push the gear away from attachment end
step.info: Force the gear down the shaft, away from its mounted position

substep.cmd: Locate the two-piece ring in shaft groove
Use screwdriver or chisel to drive out both ring halves

step.info: Force the gear off the end of the shaft
